original_text: I also said to the people at that time, “Let every man and his servant pass the night within Jerusalem, that they may be a guard for us by night and may labor by day.”
korean_text: 그 때에 내가 또 백성에게 말하기를 사람마다 그 종자와 함께 예루살렘 안에서 잘지니 밤에는 우리를 위하여 파수하겠고 낮에는 일하리라 하고

sentences.original_text: I also said to the people at that time,
Let every man and his servant
that they may be a guard for us by night
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 밤에는 우리를 위하여 파수꾼이 되게 하려 함이라
